ce0b961e-2e7e-46cc-9f30-03853e4a98e0.name: A further 20 points in chi abilities or these abilities

ee07f088-c29b-4dae-8ccc-aa72544dcdba.name: 战斗反射
ee07f088-c29b-4dae-8ccc-aa72544dcdba.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

51ed4152-fac2-4626-839b-3a1ddbfff8d3.name: 健康
51ed4152-fac2-4626-839b-3a1ddbfff8d3.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

4cc0913c-41d2-45dd-8aa1-44a1afd00cbf.name: Fit, Very
4cc0913c-41d2-45dd-8aa1-44a1afd00cbf.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

cb8896f7-7e23-41f3-8bd8-2392621f5d13.name: 高痛阈
cb8896f7-7e23-41f3-8bd8-2392621f5d13.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

c4aa61ac-5f20-4c1b-aa0f-1644e4f12a1d.name: 幸运
c4aa61ac-5f20-4c1b-aa0f-1644e4f12a1d.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

d65fee09-3b42-48ad-9a9d-f8198d122659.name: 标志性装备
d65fee09-3b42-48ad-9a9d-f8198d122659.notes: Gear is worth (starting wealth)/10 per level

46f8ff0e-2e71-4948-a8ff-b153cb308f78.name: Weapon Bond
46f8ff0e-2e71-4948-a8ff-b153cb308f78.notes: You own a Weapon that is uniquely suited to you.

a50cdb69-209a-47cf-ba99-7ce09c0f4a71.name: 两种通常会在一起使用的武器

b024e482-2175-4817-86a4-b7751048c444.name: 慢速
b024e482-2175-4817-86a4-b7751048c444.notes: 你每 12 小时额外恢复 1 HP

2995f6ee-1b0f-43a6-b903-37f67f1d57d7.name: 常规
2995f6ee-1b0f-43a6-b903-37f67f1d57d7.notes: 你每 1 小时额外恢复 1 HP

51ba498d-3f7f-40e0-8d6e-d449a597734a.name: 快速
51ba498d-3f7f-40e0-8d6e-d449a597734a.notes: 你每 1 分钟额外恢复 1 HP

4b332898-f5a4-4282-a8ba-15fc6d1fcdc8.name: @罕见：加速度，高原反应，潜水病，晕船，或是太空病等@

3c53fb25-1ddf-405a-86db-b2f387b0ff39.name: A further -15 points from the previous and

3702d3f0-f8bf-4c18-a956-4f347291dbbc.name: 执念
3702d3f0-f8bf-4c18-a956-4f347291dbbc.notes: Perfect my Art at any cost!

65a691ae-4c71-47e1-8ded-2c75ac3edfcb.name: 社会污名（少数群体）
65a691ae-4c71-47e1-8ded-2c75ac3edfcb.notes: -2 Reaction from others; +2 Reaction in own group

94845c39-77f3-4854-b1f4-c2f815302ae1.name: Judo
94845c39-77f3-4854-b1f4-c2f815302ae1.notes: 使得你获得每轮用两只手各招架一次的能力。

87a87558-ad76-49a0-a60e-1b4c47c47842.name: No Melee Skills, But raise one of judo and karate to 8 points and the other to 4.

9bd43bf9-568e-403e-a7fc-5e7de95e5712.name: One of the above Melee Skills, and raise Judo ad Karate to 4 points

295ee326-5e49-4aa1-b147-e19b38efb45b.notes: Gets +2 to disarm when wielded with Jitte/Sai skill; see pp. B208, B401.

1f655692-192b-401e-8e02-985b356b4f01.notes: Attack receives damage bonuses for whichever of Boxing (p. B182), Brawling (p. B182), or Karate (p. B203) is used to deliver it

9f3d92bd-83b4-4dc4-ae98-b7b46bd3b202.text: For the Martial Artist Loadout, select either Empty-Hand Warrior or Armored Martial Artist, then add a weapon lens.
